BUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=OFF

//Path to a library.
LIB_EAY_DEBUG:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Debug/lib/libcrypto.lib

//Path to a library.
LIB_EAY_LIBRARY_DEBUG:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Debug/lib/libcrypto.lib

//Path to a library.
LIB_EAY_RELEASE:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Release/lib/libcrypto.lib

//Path to a file.
OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR:PATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Release/include

OPENSSL_ROOT_DIR:PATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Release

//Path to a library.
SSL_EAY_DEBUG:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Debug/lib/libssl.lib

//Path to a library.
SSL_EAY_LIBRARY_DEBUG:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Debug/lib/libssl.lib

//Path to a library.
SSL_EAY_RELEASE:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/OpenSSL/VS16.0-WIN32-Release/lib/libssl.lib

//Compile with blowfish support
WITH_BLOWFISH_CIPHER:BOOL=ON

//Build with calltrace debug output
WITH_DEBUG_CALLTRACE:BOOL=OFF

//Build with cryto debug output
WITH_DEBUG_CRYPTO:BOOL=OFF

//Build with packet debug output
WITH_DEBUG_PACKET:BOOL=OFF

//Build with DSA
WITH_DSA:BOOL=ON

//Enable DH Group exchange mechanisms
WITH_GEX:BOOL=ON

//Compile with Pcap generation support
WITH_PCAP:BOOL=ON

//Build with PKCS#11 URI support
WITH_PKCS11_URI:BOOL=OFF

//Build with SSH server support
WITH_SERVER:BOOL=ON

//Build with SFTP support
WITH_SFTP:BOOL=ON

//Build with symbol versioning
WITH_SYMBOL_VERSIONING:BOOL=ON

//Build with ZLIB support
WITH_ZLIB:BOOL=ON

ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR:PATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/zlib-1.2.11

ZLIB_LIBRARY_DEBUG:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/zlib-1.2.11/contrib/vstudio/vc16.0/x86/ZlibStatDebug/zlibstat.lib

ZLIB_LIBRARY_RELEASE:FILEPATH=C:/Development/Dependencies/zlib-1.2.11/contrib/vstudio/vc16.0/x86/ZlibStatReleaseWithoutAsm/zlibstat.lib
